Title: Trailer Park Boys: Countdown to Liquor Day
Writer: Mike Clattenburg (screenplay), Robb Wells (screenplay), John Paul Tremblay (screenplay), Mike Smith (screenplay), Timm Hannebohm (screenplay)
Actors: Robb Wells, John Paul Tremblay, Mike Smith, John Dunsworth
Plot: The boys return from jail to find the park has deteriorated, with a brand new park being created beside it. They attempt a series of get rich quick schemes and robberies, while a freshly drunk Lahey threatens to derail their plans.
